channel.title: You read the object and teleport home :)

item.title: You read the object and teleport home :)
item.dc:creator: @try_again try again
item.description:
@try_again wrote:

This code is ment to activate a teleport so when I read the book it teleports me home if(itemID == 4829) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("message"); actionName = "[read]"; actionTimer = 01; setAnimation(132); teleportToX = 3333; teleportToY = 2222; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
I placed this under a case and got and got this error

client.java:1999: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemID location : class client if(itemID == 3829) ^

What does this mean? Is there another place that I should place this? Im new at coding learning slowly by reading tuts etc.

Could anybody give me a step by step guide of where to put this please ?

Read full topic
item.source: You read the object and teleport home :)
